name: Undead Uprising
description: A necromancer has raised an army of undead
creatures that now threaten the peaceful
Put an end to this supernatural menace
and ensure the safety of innocent civilians
by confronting the source of this dark magic.

dialogs.start1: Thank the gods you're here! The dead have risen from their graves!
dialogs.start2: A dark necromancer has cursed our lands with his foul magic.
dialogs.start3: Please, you must help us put these tormented souls to rest.
dialogs.progress1: The undead numbers are thinning, but their master still commands them.
dialogs.progress2: You've found his lair? Be careful - dark magic runs thick there.
dialogs.complete1: It's over! The necromancer has been vanquished!
dialogs.complete2: The dead can finally rest in peace. You've saved us all.
